TopicTitle: Has anyone been at the DT 2017 concert in Toronto?

Articles.Content: Has anyone here been at the November 12 Dream Theater "Images, Words, and Beyond" concert in Toronto? At the Sony Centre for the Performing Arts? Just asking out of interest.

wich years in the inca calendar 12 november do you refer too ? (sup matu srry for the hikjack thread)
